definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: B----Oh, Come on, high cal is exactly the thing we need here!
sentences.chinese: 哦，開什麼玩笑，高卡路里正是我們需要的。

sentences.english: Popular cold-weather beverages also can be packed with calories, fat and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 冬季裏流行的飲品也富含卡路里，脂肪和糖分。

sentences.english: The result of this rule for Okinawans is that they end up eating fewer calories than most people.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法使沖繩島民攝入的卡路里比大多數人要少。

sentences.english: Watch the calories, they count when you are trying to lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 看住卡路里，他在減肥過程中很重要。

sentences.english: How do you feel about counting calories?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼看計算卡路里攝入量？

sentences.english: In other words, they lost weight because they consumed fewer calories.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，他們變輕是因爲他們喫入了更少的卡路里。

sentences.english: A small plastic pumpkin filled to the top contains about 5600 calories.
sentences.chinese: 一個小小的塑料南瓜最高熱量達到了5600卡路里。

sentences.english: We basically add on all the liquid calories to what we're eating.
sentences.chinese: 我們基本上在喫的東西里加入液體的卡路里。

sentences.english: The quality of a meal may affect how its calories are used.
sentences.chinese: 每頓飯食物的品質會影響卡路里利用的方式。

sentences.english: Goat penises kind of taste like Venison. They are low in fat and calories.
sentences.chinese: 山羊鞭味道類似鹿肉，低脂肪，低卡路里。

sentences.english: When it comes to alcohol calories, limit yourself to one.
sentences.chinese: 談到酒精中所含的卡路里，請以一杯爲限。
而這些卡路里來自於兩個甜甜圈。

sentences.english: Banging your head against a wall uses 150 calories a hour
sentences.chinese: 拿頭撞牆可以每小時消耗150卡路里。

sentences.english: Ten-thousand steps. Sixteen-hundred calories. Eight hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 十萬步，1600卡路里，每天八小時。

sentences.english: We all accept that eating away from home can add more calories.
sentences.chinese: 不在家喫時，我們所有人總能接受加入更多的卡路里。

definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
to save food/to go on a diet
